title: Libya condemns killing of Ethiopian Christians by ISIL
description: Foreign minister of UN-recognised government, Muhammad Dayri, calls on UN to supply arms to tackle armed group.

title: Large explosions rock Yemeni capital Sanaa
description: Mushroom clouds rise in the sky in western Sanaa where the capital's largest weapons caches are located.

title: Blog: Shanghai auto show bans scantily dressed models
description: Girls, who traditionally drape themselves over vehicles, are now fully clothed, as China furthers its austerity drive.

title: China's Xi Jinping in Pakistan to unveil trade plan
description: Proposed $46bn project will connect Pakistan and China through a 3,000km trade route built over the next 15 years.

title: LeBron, Irving help Cleveland win opening playoff game
description: Cavaliers seal comfortable win over Celtics while Hawks, Clippers and Memphis also registers wins.

title: Siberia's tug of war over Lake Baikal's water
description: Villagers struggle to cope as world's largest freshwater lake drops to its lowest level in 60 years.
